languages.text: "Да будет так. Суд объявляет Инцендию Чорда... виновной". {n}Грациозным движением Вольный Торговец извлекает из кобуры украшенный пистолет, подносит к виску и закрывает глаза.{/n} "Помилуй меня, Император, Защитник Человечества, властитель Святой Терры".

traits.locale_text: "Да будет так. Суд объявляет Инцендию Чорда... виновной". {n}Грациозным движением Вольный Торговец извлекает из кобуры украшенный пистолет, подносит к виску и закрывает глаза.{/n} "Помилуй меня, Император, Защитник Человечества, властитель Святой Терры".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."
languages.original_text: "Да будет так. Суд объявляет Инцендию Чорда... виновной". {n}Грациозным движением Вольный Торговец извлекает из кобуры украшенный пистолет, подносит к виску и закрывает глаза.{/n} "Помилуй меня, Император, Защитник Человечества, властитель Святой Терры".

traits.locale_text: "So be it. The court declares Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader produces an ornate pistol out of its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "So be it. The court declares Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader produces an ornate pistol out of its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “既然如此，本法庭在此宣判因森蒂娅·库尔达……有罪。”{n}因森蒂娅以优雅的动作，从枪套中取出一把装饰华丽的手枪，抵在自己的太阳穴上，闭上了眼睛。{/n}“帝皇陛下，人类的守护者，神圣泰拉的主人，请怜悯我吧。”
languages.original_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，本法庭宣判因森蒂娅·库尔达……有罪。”{n}因森蒂娅以优雅的动作，从枪套中取出一把装饰华丽的手枪，抵在自己的太阳穴上，闭上了眼睛。{/n}“帝皇陛下，人类的守护者，神圣泰拉的主人，请怜悯我吧。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「裁判所はインセンディア・チョーダを…有罪と宣言する」{n}自由開拓者は、優雅な動きでホルスターから装飾されたピストルを取り出し、こめかみに当てて目を閉じた。{/n}「人類の守護者である、聖なる地球の主の、皇帝よ。どうか、私に慈悲を」
languages.original_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: 「裁判所はインセンディア・チョーダを…有罪と宣言する」{n}自由開拓者は、優雅な動きでホルスターから装飾されたピストルを取り出し、こめかみに当てて目を閉じた。{/n}「人類の守護者である、聖なる地球の主の、皇帝よ。どうか、私に慈悲を」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Que así sea. El tribunal declara a Incendia Chorda... culpable». {n}Con un movimiento elegante, la Comerciante Independiente saca una pistola decorada de su funda, se la lleva a la sien y cierra los ojos.{/n} «Tenga piedad de mí, Emperador, Protector de la Humanidad, Señor de la Sagrada Terra».
languages.original_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: «Que así sea. El tribunal declara a Incendia Chorda... culpable». {n}Con un movimiento elegante, la Comerciante Independiente saca una pistola decorada de su funda, se la lleva a la sien y cierra los ojos.{/n} «Tenga piedad de mí, Emperador, Protector de la Humanidad, Maestro de la Sagrada Terra».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "So sei es. Das Gericht erklärt Incendia Chorda hiermit ... für schuldig." {n}Mit einer anmutigen Bewegung zieht die Freihändlerin eine elegant verzierte Pistole aus ihrem Halfter, führt sie an ihre Schläfe und schließt die Augen.{/n} "Habt Gnade mit mir, Imperator, Beschützer der Menschheit, Herr des Heiligen Terra."
languages.original_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: "So sei es. Das Gericht erklärt Incendia Chorda ... für schuldig." {n}Mit einer anmutigen Bewegung zieht die Freihändlerin eine elegant verzierte Pistole aus ihrem Halfter, führt sie an ihre Schläfe und schließt die Augen.{/n} "Habt Gnade mit mir, Imperator, Beschützer der Menschheit, Herr des Heiligen Terra."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Très bien. La cour déclare Incendia Chorda... coupable. » {n}D'un geste gracieux, la libre-marchande tire un pistolet richement décoré de son étui, le porte à sa tempe et ferme les yeux.{/n} « Ayez pitié de moi, ô Empereur, Protecteur de l'humanité, maître de la Sainte Terra. »
languages.original_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. La cour déclare Incendia Chorda... coupable. » {n}D'un geste gracieux, la libre-marchande sort un pistolet richement décoré de son étui, le porte à sa tempe et ferme les yeux.{/n} « Ayez pitié de moi, ô Empereur, Protecteur de l'humanité, maître de la Sainte Terra. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Öyle olsun. Mahkeme, İncendia Chorda'yı... Suçlu bulmuştur." {n}Hür Tacir; zarif bir hareketle kabzasından süslemeli bir tabanca çıkarıyor, şakağına götürüyor ve gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, Kutsal Terra'nın Efendisi, İmparator'um... Bana merhamet et."
languages.original_text: "So be it. The court hereby finds Incendia Chorda... guilty." {n}With a graceful movement, the Rogue Trader draws an ornate pistol from its holster, brings it to her temple, and shuts her eyes.{/n} "Have mercy on me, Emperor, Protector of Mankind, Master of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle olsun. Mahkeme, İncendia Chorda'yı... Suçlu bulmuştur." {n}Hür Tacir, zarif bir hareketle, kabzasından süslemeli bir tabanca çıkarıyor, şakağına götürüyor ve gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, Kutsal Terra'nın Efendisi, İmparator'um, bana merhamet et."
traits.speaker: Chorda
